::Prowl::

Prowl takes a few steps back as he sees the creature, drenched with mech 
fluid, walk  toward him. He couldn't see Iron Raptor anywhere in the 
bathroom. Either that creature had eaten her whole, which was rather 
unlikely, or ... that creature was Iron Raptor?

Prowl backs up even more, his gun aimed at the creature and ready to fire, 
but not unless it was neccesary. He narrows his eyes. The creature did 
resemble Iron Raptor a bit.......

"Doors, close and lock," he says, the doors to his quarters obeying his 
command. He looks back at the creature.

"Iron Raptor?"
